tool.name: CreateTool

param.name: taskEndpoint
param.dialogReference: The task endpoint from which to generate a tool. Use the form: http://<hostname>:<port>/ese/services/<servicename>/<taskname>. For example, to generate an ISODATAClassification tool that runs on a GSF server, you may use: http://<hostname>:<port>/ese/services/ENVI/ISODATAClassification
param.pythonReference: The task endpoint from which to generate a tool. For example, to generate an ISODATAClassification tool that runs on a GSF server, you may use: http://localhost:9191/ese/services/ENVI/ISODATAClassification

param.name: outputToolbox
param.dialogReference: The path to the generated output toolbox file.
param.pythonReference: The path to the generated output toolbox file.

tool.summary: Creates a python toolbox containing a tool generated from a task endpoint.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Creates a python toolbox containing a tool generated from a task endpoint.
